html:
12.4.18  4:16 am   can you make the ASK button bigger?

     if you look at it closer it will appear bigger

12.4.18  2:29 am   why does the lyrics page have such bright colors? it kinda strains my eyes

     that is a gentle reminder that the lyrics are meant to be listened to in the song, with the music, not read on a page

12.4.18  2:29 am   Would you ever make an album of songs that fit together thematically or is each song a completely isolated being?

     if i was going to make every song fit together i would go the extra mile and make it more than just songs

12.4.18  12:50 am   Do you ever disassociate so badly you start conversations with yourself through a question board?

     no

12.4.18  12:24 am   Are you basically bored and/or unimpressed with most music you encounter at this point in your life? I imagine having your creative palette makes other material lame.

     that's the way it was when i was much younger, until a certain pivotal turning point when i suddenly decided to become much much much more understanding, and since then i have learned and grown tremendously

12.3.18  11:51 pm   I get called rude all the time and it fucks with my self esteem bc I try so hard to be just right for everyone. I swear I'm a nice person, I just sort of lack a filter. what do

     it's good to compensate by going completely overboard about all the positive things you see and notice in your surroundings

12.3.18  11:20 pm   You seem to only like foods that have a relatively bland taste, like rice and water and sprouts, any reason for this

     i can't think of any way you would possibly know what food i like. unless you are spying on me some how

12.3.18  11:14 pm   how should I compliment people?

     tell them what you like about them

12.3.18  10:13 pm   What are some good consistent albums you enjoy listening to? Where most of the tracks share similarities in style and quality. Do you have any playlists that you use to get into certain creative moods? Kind of audio mood boards? That's what i'm wondering about when asking for consistent albums. just incase there was a better way to ask what I was trying to get answered

     i listen to songs in a different order every time. i don't know what album any of the songs i listen to are supposed to be on

12.3.18  10:07 pm   Are you the comic sans of the music world? 

     no

12.3.18  9:20 pm   you did really nice on the podcast, can you do more interviews?

     sure

12.3.18  9:07 pm   Will you do more podcasts?

     sure

12.3.18  9:06 pm   Do you want to talk about food?

     sure

12.3.18  9:06 pm   what should I do if I feel like I don't exist?

     almost anything you do will increase your sense of existence

12.3.18  8:59 pm   what is the key to success?

     it's unlocked. just open the door

12.3.18  8:36 pm   do you have a primary instrument

     not anymore

12.3.18  8:24 pm   you abstained from naming specifics when it came to your musical inspirations or even interests besides the broad stroke that is music during your appearance on the h3 podcast. is this because you feel like naming a specific artist will associate you with a genre? Is it because you truly don't have any specifics? Whats the deal big man?

     i do not like being tied down. i tied myself down very very tightly in my early years, and then realized i would ultimately never survive that way, so i had to cover myself in very slippery goo in order to escape. i escaped, but forgive me i am still covered in goo

12.3.18  7:48 pm   is there more thinking or doing in your process

     used to be 93% thinking, now it is 42% thinking and the rest doing

12.3.18  7:45 pm   do you know how to jump rope

     yes

12.3.18  7:42 pm   do you think creativity is contagious?

     yes

12.3.18  7:34 pm   do you think crabs can get crabs?

     yes

12.3.18  7:28 pm   what's your favorite thing to do while you think?

     feel

12.3.18  7:22 pm   how to stabilize emotions?

     build a catalog of some kind

12.3.18  7:21 pm   why do people care if the earth is flat or round,when we all are going to die and it doesn't matter?

     why would that make it not matter? i think you conveniently left out the part where we live

12.3.18  7:13 pm   How do you know when a project is finished?

     stop

12.3.18  7:02 pm   did you take any pictures on your latest trip?

     yes but it was bad

12.3.18  6:29 pm   What makes rice so nice?

     the simplicity

12.3.18  6:18 pm   what is the difference between an LP and an album?

     i have no idea

12.3.18  6:16 pm   When will you be formalizing your position of cult leader?

     i am not cult leader, i am cult greeter

12.3.18  5:34 pm   You cook up another fresh song?

     yes

      any chordal, melodic, or stylistic hints you could leak? 

     no

12.3.18  5:31 pm   how many times have you ever felt like you need to completely rethink and uproot all of the ways you work on things?

     maybe 50 times per year

12.3.18  5:30 pm   What's another category that you might like to put on this site some day?

     artifacts

12.3.18  5:26 pm   have you been using more capital letters in the titles of your songs because of pressure from society?

     yes

12.3.18  4:49 pm   I found my mom's stash of edibles. How do I tell my dad?

     the same way you told me, and ask him how you would tell someone else

12.3.18  4:28 pm   How strong is your blimp?

     it is about a medium strength

12.3.18  4:17 pm   why don't you do improv anymore ;_;

     too scary

12.3.18  4:13 pm   how is space doing?

     fine

12.3.18  3:43 pm   I don't understand you. There's no coherence in your music. Help me take a dive in your mind please.

     it must have been at least coherent enough to compell you to want to know more

12.3.18  3:31 pm   What do you think about modern pop

     it's good ... or at least that's the idea behind it

12.3.18  3:24 pm   How did you feel when ethan kept pushing preroll ads after you stated how you felt about them?

     fine

12.3.18  3:18 pm   is there any didderence between F7 and Fmaj7

     yes, F7 has the Eb note and Fmaj7 would have E instead

12.3.18  2:52 pm   When you're constructing your songs and videos is there a certain "feel" or "atmosphere" you're trying to achieve.

     goodness, enjoyability, etc

      Your videos seem to inspire a feeling of nostalgia with the 90s like animation your videos along with concepts such as "going home". Did this style just develop naturally or did have you chased it intentionally?

     i try to avoid it

12.3.18  2:43 pm   how can i be like you but original 

     open up a blank file and start making up shapes and patterns

12.3.18  2:16 pm   Are you fine with your music being unpopular/unappleaing to the majority of music listeners?

     no

12.3.18  2:06 pm   What job did you think you would grow up to have as a child?

     musician/performer

12.3.18  1:50 pm   Should I go to my evening class tonight even though I don't really want to?

     you should go to all or none

12.3.18  1:37 pm   will you submit to the computers

     not yet

12.3.18  1:02 pm   why is the sun green

     to gain the admiration of plants

12.3.18  12:40 pm   what's a good social construct worth figuring out?

     spirit animals

12.3.18  12:32 pm   what do you like to put in sandwiches

     additional sandwiches
